org.netbeans.jellytools

Class OptionsOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.Operator
      • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ComponentOperator
        • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ContainerOperator
          • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.WindowOperator
            • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.DialogOperator
              • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.JDialogOperator
                • org.netbeans.jellytools.NbDialogOperator
                  • org.netbeans.jellytools.OptionsOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.jemmy.Outputable, org.netbeans.jemmy.Timeoutable

    public class OptionsOperator
extends NbDialogOperator
    Provides access to the Options window and it's subcomponents. Use PropertySheet class to access properties. treeTable() method returns TreeTable operator for options list accessing.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public TreeTableOperator treeTable()
        Getter for table containing property list and property definition levels.
        Returns:
        TreeTableOperator instance

      • selectOption

        public int selectOption(String optionPath)
        Selects an option in the options tree.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.
        Returns:
        row index of selected node (starts at 0)

      • getPropertySheet

        public PropertySheetOperator getPropertySheet(String optionPath)
        Selects an option in the options tree, waits for property sheet corresponding to selected node and returns instance of PropertySheetOperator.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.
        Returns:
        PropertySheetOperator of selected option

      • showLevels

        public void showLevels()
        Shows definition levels column by clicking on the "<<" table column title.

      • hideLevels

        public void hideLevels()
        Hides definition levels column by clicking on the ">>" table column title.

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(String optionPath,
                     int level)
        Sets definition level for the option.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.
        level - One of the USER_LEVEL or DEFAULT_LEVEL

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel(String optionPath)
        Gets definition level for the option.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.
        Returns:
        level One of the USER_LEVEL or DEFAULT_LEVEL

      • setUserLevel

        public void setUserLevel(String optionPath)
        Make an option to be difined on the user level.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.

        public void setDefaultLevel(String optionPath)
        Make an option to be difined on the default level.
        Parameters:
        optionPath - Path to the option in left (tree-like) column.

                        int level)
        Sets a level for the row index.
        Parameters:
        row - row index in the table
        level - level value

      • editLevel

        protected void editLevel(int rowIndex,
                         int colIndex,
                         String value)
        Causes table editing and chooses a value in the combobox.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - Row index.
        colIndex - Column index. One of the columns containing level definition marks.
        value - String value to be choosed in the combobox.
